Tools.keyName: Toggle Selection and Direct Selection tool
Tools.keyTrans: 切换选择和直接选择工具

Tools.keyValue: Spacebar (Layout mode), Alt (Text mode), or Alt+Spacebar (both)

Tools.keyName: Toggle between Formatting Affects Container and Formatting Affects Text
Tools.keyTrans: 在 “格式影响容器 ”和 “格式影响文本 ”之间切换

Tools.keyName: Switch between Normal View and Preview Mode
Tools.keyTrans: 在正常视图和预览模式之间切换

Selecting and moving objects.keyName: Temporarily select Selection or Direct Selection tool (last used)
Selecting and moving objects.keyTrans: 临时选择 “选择 ”或 “直接选择 ”工具（上次使用）
临时选择群组选择工具
Selecting and moving objects.keyValue: Direct Selection tool+Alt; or Pen, Add Anchor Point, or Delete Anchor Point tool+Alt+Ctrl

Selecting and moving objects.keyName: Add to or subtract from a selection of multiple objects
Selecting and moving objects.keyTrans: 从多个对象的选区中添加或减去内容
Selecting and moving objects.keyValue: Selection, Direct Selection, or Group Selection tool+Shift–click (to deselect, click center point)
Selection, Direct Selection, or Group Selection tool+Alt–drag
Alt+Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Up Arrow, or Down Arrow key

Selecting and moving objects.keyName: Duplicate and offset selection by 10 times
Selecting and moving objects.keyTrans: 复制选区并偏移 10 倍
Selecting and moving objects.keyValue: Alt+Shift+Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Up Arrow, Down Arrow key
Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Up Arrow, Down Arrow key
Ctrl+Shift+Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Up Arrow, Down arrow key
Shift+Left Arrow, Right Arrow, Up Arrow, Down Arrow key

Selecting and moving objects.keyName: Select master page item from document page
Selecting and moving objects.keyTrans: 从文档页面选择主页面项目

Selecting and moving objects.keyName: Select next object behind or in front
Selecting and moving objects.keyTrans: 选择后面或前面的下一个对象

Selecting and moving objects.keyName: Select next or previous frame in story
Selecting and moving objects.keyTrans: 在故事中选择下一帧或上一帧

Selecting and moving objects.keyName: Select first or last frame in story
Selecting and moving objects.keyTrans: 选择故事中的第一帧或最后一帧

Transforming objects.keyValue: Select object+double-click Scale tool, Rotate tool, or Shear tool in Toolbox

Transforming objects.keyTrans: 调整边框和内容的大小
按比例调整边框和内容的大小

Transforming objects.keyValue: Ellipse tool, Polygon tool, or Rectangle tool+Shift–drag

Transforming objects.keyName: Switch image from High Quality Display to Fast Display
Transforming objects.keyTrans: 将图像从高质量显示切换到快速显示

Editing paths and frames.keyName: Temporarily select Convert Direction Point tool
Editing paths and frames.keyTrans: 临时选择转换方向点工具
Editing paths and frames.keyValue: Direct Selection tool+Alt+Ctrl, or Pen tool+Alt

Editing paths and frames.keyName: Temporarily switch between Add Anchor Point and Delete Anchor Point tool
Editing paths and frames.keyTrans: 在添加锚点和删除锚点工具之间临时切换

Editing paths and frames.keyName: Temporarily select Add Anchor Point tool
Editing paths and frames.keyTrans: 临时选择添加锚点工具

Editing paths and frames.keyName: Keep Pen tool selected when pointer is over path or anchor point
Editing paths and frames.keyTrans: 当指针位于路径或锚点上方时，保持选择钢笔工具

Editing paths and frames.keyName: Move anchor point and handles while drawing
Editing paths and frames.keyTrans: 绘图时移动锚点和手柄

Tables.keyName: Insert or delete rows or columns while dragging
Tables.keyTrans: 拖动时插入或删除行或列
Tables.keyValue: Begin dragging row or column border, and then hold down Alt as you drag

Tables.keyName: Resize rows or columns without changing the size of the table
Tables.keyTrans: 在不改变表格大小的情况下调整行或列的大小
Tables.keyValue: Shift–drag interior row or column border

Tables.keyTrans: 按比例调整行或列的大小
Tables.keyValue: Shift–drag right or bottom table border

Tables.keyTrans: 移动到下一个/上一个单元格

Tables.keyName: Move to first/last cell in column
Tables.keyTrans: 移至列中的第一个/最后一个单元格

Tables.keyName: Move to first/last cell in row
Tables.keyTrans: 移动到行的第一个/最后一个单元格

Tables.keyName: Move to first/last row in frame
Tables.keyTrans: 移动到框中的第一行/最后一行
向上/向下移动一个单元格
向左/向右移动一个单元格

Tables.keyName: Select cell above/below the current cell
Tables.keyTrans: 选择当前单元格上方/下方的单元格

Tables.keyName: Select cell to the right/left of the current cell
Tables.keyTrans: 选择当前单元格右侧/左侧的单元格

Tables.keyName: Toggle between text selection and cell selection
Tables.keyTrans: 在文本选择和单元格选择之间切换

Finding and changing text.keyName: Insert selected text into Find What box
Finding and changing text.keyTrans: 将选定文本插入 “查找内容 ”框

Finding and changing text.keyName: Insert selected text into Find What box and finds next
Finding and changing text.keyTrans: 将选定文本插入 “查找内容 ”框并查找下一个内容

Finding and changing text.keyName: Find next occurrence of Find What text
Finding and changing text.keyTrans: 查找下一个出现的 “查找内容 ”文本

Finding and changing text.keyName: Insert selected text into Change To box
Finding and changing text.keyTrans: 将选定文本插入 “更改至 ”框

Finding and changing text.keyName: Replace selection with Change To text
Finding and changing text.keyTrans: 用 “更改至 ”文本替换选中文本

Working with type.keyName: Bold (only for fonts with bold face)
Working with type.keyTrans: 粗体（仅适用于粗体字体）

Working with type.keyName: Italic (only for fonts with italic face)
Working with type.keyTrans: 斜体（仅适用于斜体字体）

Working with type.keyName: Reset horizontal or vertical scale to 100%
Working with type.keyTrans: 将水平或垂直缩放比例重置为 100%

Working with type.keyName: Basic letter group setting or detail setting
Working with type.keyTrans: 基本字母组设置或细节设置

Working with type.keyValue: Shift+Ctrl+F (all lines) or J (all but last line)

Working with type.keyName: Align both ends or equal spacing
Working with type.keyValue: Shift+Ctrl+F (align both end) or J (equal spacing)

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease point size by five times
Working with type.keyTrans: 将字号增大或缩小五倍
增加或减少前导（水平文本）
增加或减少前导（垂直文本）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease leading by five times (horizontal text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少五倍前导（横排文字）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease leading by five times (vertical text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少五倍前导（垂直文本）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease kerning and tracking (horizontal text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少字距和跟踪（水平文本）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease kerning and tracking (vertical text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少字距和跟踪（竖排文本）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease kerning and tracking by five times (horizontal text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少五倍字距和跟踪（水平文本）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease kerning and tracking by five times (vertical text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少五倍的字间距和跟踪（垂直文本）
增加字与字之间的字间距

Working with type.keyName: Clear all manual kerning and reset tracking to 0
Working with type.keyTrans: 清除所有手动字距调整并将跟踪重置为 0

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease baseline shift (horizontal text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少基线偏移（横向文本）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease baseline shift (vertical text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少基线偏移（垂直文本）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease baseline shift by five times (horizontal text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 将基线偏移增加或减少五倍（水平文本）

Working with type.keyName: Increase or decrease baseline shift by five times (vertical text)
Working with type.keyTrans: 将基线偏移增加或减少五倍（竖排文本）

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Move to right or left one character
Navigating through and selecting text.keyTrans: 向右或向左移动一个字符

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Move up or down one line
Move to right or left one word
Navigating through and selecting text.keyTrans: 向右或向左移动一个字

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Move to start or end of line
Move to previous or next paragraph
Move to start or end of story
Select one word
Select one character right or left
Navigating through and selecting text.keyTrans: 向右或向左选择一个字符

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Select one line above or below
Select start or end of line
Navigating through and selecting text.keyTrans: 选择一行的开始或结束

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Select one paragraph
Navigating through and selecting text.keyValue: Triple-click or quadruple-click paragraph, depending on Text Preferences setting

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Select one paragraph before or after
Select current line
Select characters from insertion point
Select start or end of story
Navigating through and selecting text.keyTrans: 选择故事的开始或结束

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Select all in story
Navigating through and selecting text.keyTrans: 选择故事中的所有内容

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Select first/last frame
Select previous/next frame
Delete word in front of insertion point (Story Editor)
Navigating through and selecting text.keyTrans: 删除插入点前面的字（故事编辑器）

Navigating through and selecting text.keyName: Update missing font list

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyValue: Spacebar (with no text insertion point), Alt-drag (with text insertion point), or Alt+spacebar (in both text and non-text modes)

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyName: Switch between current and previous zoom levels
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyTrans: 在当前和上一个缩放级别之间切换
切换到下一个/上一个文档窗口
向上/向下滚动一个屏幕
后退/前移到上次查看的页面
转到上一个/下一个页面

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyName: Go to master page while \ panel is closed
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyTrans: 关闭面板时转到主页面
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyValue: Ctrl+J, type prefix of master, press Enter

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyName: Switch between page and spread guides (creation only)
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyTrans: 在页面和展页导引之间切换（仅限创建）

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyName: Create vertical and horizontal ruler guides for the spread
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyTrans: 为页码创建垂直和水平标尺导轨

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyValue: Right-click zero point and choose an option

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyName: Use current magnification for view threshold of new guide
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyTrans: 使用当前放大率查看新导轨的阈值

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyName: Select buttons in alert dialog boxes
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyTrans: 在提示对话框中选择按钮
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyValue: Press first letter of button name, if underlined

Viewing documents and document workspace.keyName: Show information on installed plug‑ins and InDesign components
Viewing documents and document workspace.keyTrans: 显示已安装插件和 InDesign 组件的信息

Control panel.keyTrans: 将焦点切换到/离开控制面板
切换字符/段落文本属性模式

Control panel.keyName: Change reference point when proxy has focus
Control panel.keyTrans: 当代理具有焦点时更改参考点
Control panel.keyValue: Any key on the numeric keypad or keyboard numbers

Control panel.keyName: Display the pop-up menu that has focus
Control panel.keyTrans: 显示有焦点的弹出式菜单
打开单位和增量首选项

Control panel.keyName: Open the Text Frame Options dialog box
Control panel.keyTrans: 打开文本框选项对话框

Control panel.keyValue: Alt-click X or Y Scale icon
Alt-click Superscript, Subscript, or Small Caps button

Control panel.keyName: Open the Underline Options dialog box
Control panel.keyTrans: 打开下划线选项对话框

Control panel.keyName: Open the Strikethrough Options dialog box
Control panel.keyTrans: 打开删除线选项对话框

Control panel.keyValue: Alt-click Align To Baseline Grid, or Do Not Align To Baseline Grid button

Control panel.keyName: Open the Drop Caps & Nested Styles dialog box
Control panel.keyTrans: 打开 “下拉菜单和嵌套样式 ”对话框
Control panel.keyValue: Alt-click Drop Cap Number Of Lines, or Drop Cap One Or More Characters icon

Control panel.keyTrans: 打开已命名网格对话框

Control panel.keyName: Open New Named Grid Options dialog box
Control panel.keyTrans: 打开新命名网格选项对话框

Control panel.keyName: Open Frame Grid Options dialog box
Control panel.keyTrans: 打开框架网格选项对话框
Control panel.keyValue: Alt-click Number of characters Horizontal, Number of Characters Vertical, Character Aki, Line Aki, Vertical Scale, Horizontal Scale, Grid View, Font Size, Number of Columns, or Column Gutter icon

Tabs panel.keyTrans: 在对齐方式选项之间切换

Layers panel.keyTrans: 选择图层上的所有对象

Layers panel.keyValue: Alt-drag small square to new layer

Layers panel.keyName: Add new layer below selected layer
Layers panel.keyTrans: 在选定图层下方添加新图层

Layers panel.keyName: Add new layer to the top of the layer list
Layers panel.keyTrans: 将新图层添加到图层列表顶部

Layers panel.keyName: Add new layer to the top of the layer list and open New Layer dialog box
Layers panel.keyTrans: 在图层列表顶部添加新图层并打开 “新建图层 ”对话框

Layers panel.keyName: Add new layer and open New Layer dialog box
Layers panel.keyTrans: 添加新图层并打开 “新建图层 ”对话框

Pages panel.keyTrans: 将母版应用于所选页面

Pages panel.keyName: Base another master page on selected master
Pages panel.keyTrans: 以选定的母版为基础创建另一个母版页面
Pages panel.keyValue: Alt-click the master you want to base the selected master on

Pages panel.keyName: Add new page after last page
Pages panel.keyTrans: 在最后一页后添加新页面

Color panel.keyName: Select a color for the nonactive fill or stroke
Color panel.keyTrans: 为非活动填充或描边选择颜色

Color panel.keyName: Switch between color modes (CMYK, RGB, LAB)

Separations Preview panel.keyTrans: 显示第 2 个斑点印版
显示第 3 个斑点印版

Swatches panel.keyName: Create new swatch based on the current swatch
Swatches panel.keyTrans: 根据当前色板创建新色板

Swatches panel.keyName: Create spot color swatch based on the current swatch
Swatches panel.keyTrans: 根据当前色板创建专色色板
在不应用色板的情况下更改选项

Transform panel.keyName: Apply width, height, or scale value proportionally
Transform panel.keyTrans: 按比例应用宽度、高度或缩放值

toolTrans: 查看文档和文档工作区
